About Me

My name is Zehong Yu (喻泽弘). I am a Master student at the Software System Security Assurance Group at Tsinghua University since September 2021, under the tutelage of Prof. Yu Jiang, currently. I received my bachelor degree in software engineering from Southeast University in 2021.

My works focus on improving the efficiency of code generation and test case generation for Simulink models. Besides, I’m also interested in the areas of model driven development and embedded software engineering.
